siteMetadata.title: react-seo-meta-tags
siteMetadata.description: React SEO meta tag library for quickly adding the basic meta-tags for eg a Gatsby website

site.siteName: React SEO Meta Tags npm library

markdownRemark.html:
Hello there!

You should pay close attention to the dimensions of your image, the 1.91:1 ratio is no joke and you should follow it. Otherwise images such as this get cropped weirdly.

This blog is awesome.
